keys.string: Arun I found it! The VR controller!
That’s good news. I already bought a new headset but, you can never have enough I guess. Heh heh heh.
Man of few words... Interesting mmm
I feel like I should repay you for finding the controller.
Well I’m poor and hungry, so that sounds great!
You both enjoy some food from the greek restaurant next door.
Well in terms of value it seems like I’m winning, heh heh heh.
The crickets have left at this point.
All right well thanks for the meal. I’ve got some work to do. I’ll see you in class.
Dr. Arun waves as you are leaving.
